content: Within the search parameter FHIR doc at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/searchparameters.html is anyone able to click on the various parameters and see Narrative Content? I cannot tell if these are dead links or if the page is down.
The link is good, but the narrative did not get generated for them, the tabs for XML and JSON are good. Will need to fix that. can you create a tracker? Thx
Thanks! How do I create a tracker?
bottom each page should be a link to the tracker tool. need to login but is free.
Strange one. The narrative is in the xml!/json too.
